welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Belgrave, UK! Nestled in the heart of the countryside, this charming town is known for its picturesque views and beautiful landmarks. We invite you to explore and experience all that Belgrave has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Northampton Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
